website_summaries.verdict: Sharp-looking volleyball for indoor players that includes a high-quality design.
pros: Same ball that was used in the past 3 summer Olympic games
Limited number of panels (8), which provides a greater contact area on the ball than some others
Includes a microfiber material with dimples on the exterior of the ball to ensure a truer flight through the air
cons: Volleyball costs more than some other models

customer_reviews.title: Great volleyball and i believe a real ball
customer_reviews.text: I have played volleyball for about 8-10 years and this ball seems real after 3 or 4 months of use. The ball is a little bit hard to use for some of my beginnner friends, but for an advanced or intermediate player this ball is great. It is a little bit cheaper then the molten and about equivilant depending on your preferences. Cant go wrong with this ball.
customer_reviews.author: CaseyTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. I don't know what people are talking about when they say beware of fakes because this one is the real deal. Just make sure you are buying from Mikasa is my word of warning I guess. I brought this to a few of my pick up volleyball games and my friends can't stop raving about it. A few of my friends (girls) said it was a little hard on their forearms while passing, but once we adjusted the pressure to a good amount, there were no complaints. This is a great ball for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Great grip if you play this ball for a while, especially if your hands are a little sweaty. There is something about this ball that other balls don't have. I like how "mellow" it feels when you set it. Also, compared to Molten, this ball doesn't have that "balloon" feeling when you hit it. I am not sure about the floats, I did not see any difference between Molten and this ball. I think this is more of a "hype." Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: TheReader

customer_reviews.title: A great ball
customer_reviews.text: I own many volleyballs, but this is the one I gravitate towards, when I practice setting (which is all the time). Feels great in the hand, has a nice rebound. Does get a little slick when people start sweating, but that is part of the game, you'll learn to deal. It will last you forever, as long as you don't abuse it (use it outside/around sharp objects/kick it) Still a great option, even though there is a newer model.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Molten5000
customer_reviews.text: Where I play, this is the only ball we use. The elegant but subtle leather, the dimples, and the color pattern make up a ridiculously technologically advanced yet simple ball. Float serves act well on court, however, this ball definitely loves to be hit hard. Really great for blocking, spiking, and serving; however, sometimes feels a little "slippery", not very noticeable, but could be a disadvantage to setters. I play college volleyball and would recommend this ball.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. It's a little on the heavy & hard side, so I wasn't so sure when I first warmed up with it. But once actual play started it felt nice and "grippy" when I set, and felt like I had pretty good (better?) control receiving tough serves, so maybe the claim that these colors are easiest for human eyes to see are true. (Ha ha..don't mind all the help I can get.) Timely delivery. Was not inflated, but I wasn't expecting it to be, based on website info/reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Susie in San Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, especially for setters.
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for setters and hitters. Definitely harder to pass than the more common Tachikara's which are softer. The texture on this makes it a setter's dream though. Even high spin balls can be braked and set easily. Lower level players don't want to play with this ball unless you slightly under inflate this to make it softer. Big hitters like the solid contact and satisfying "thump."
customer_reviews.author: Jered Cuenco

customer_reviews.title: Amazing volleyball for professional games
customer_reviews.text: I am a varsity volleyball player and I needed a ball that would provide great quality and value. This ball satisfied both those requirements. Even if this ball is a little more expensive than others, the extra price definitely explains itself through the superb quality of the ball. It is hard and dense like a real men's volleyball should be. It is great for getting in those satisfying spikes and digs, and it provided me with a lot of practice at home. This volleyball is definitely worth every dollar, and I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Huang

customer_reviews.title: Mikasa is the Best!
customer_reviews.text: We have been playing for 5 years on sand with the Mikasa Beach Volleyball, finally started playing indoors as weather does not permit outdoor play, went with out favorite brand. Most players loved the ball, while a few felt that it was a bit hard, it just takes getting used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Venki

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a plastic knockoff!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve purchased this ball twice - once several years ago and played the hell out of it, and then needed to replace it and bought it again. The new ball we received is absolute trash - it’s hard as a rock and we’ve never actually been able to play a game with it. I’ve been playing volleyball for 20+ years and have never played with a ball that felt like I was trying to dig a solid brick. Not sure why the quality is such garbage but it’s really disappointing. Feels like a Dick’s Sporting Goods cheap knockoff.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other people's experience. For $50 I was expecting a nicer ball but this one feels like plastic and no one wants to use it because it hurts. I thought over time it might change, but no change. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Tarnutzer

customer_reviews.title: Expected a better product
customer_reviews.text: I am a very active player, between coaching and playing I spend five days per week doing volleyball, I'm a little disappointed because I really wanted to play with this ball but not too many people like it. It feels heavier and slippery, I personally like it for setting since it feels smaller than other balls but it does feel hard for the arms for passing.
customer_reviews.author: K Bolanos

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball came deflated. This caused some wrinkles that are not affecting the feel or play of the ball. They are still visible if you look for them. I do think that next time I’ll ask to only get an inflated ball. I still prefer the old leather Tachikara.
customer_reviews.author: Tarik E. Sivonen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the Official Size 5
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, this ball is about 1/4 inch smaller than the other Volleyballs and even an older MVA200 size 5. At first I thought it's a fake ball since material felt like plastic and it was smaller, but after ordering another ball directly from Mikasa USA , i received the same thing. Thanks to Amazon easy return and refund i got my money back but now i have to deal with Mikasa USA return.
customer_reviews.author: Arman Nahavandifar

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: You'll never want to use a cheap volleyball again. This is a standard indoor tournament ball. It feels great. My student athletes always ask to borrow it instead of the school supplied rubber or softie volleyballs, because there's so much more control over the ball. To me it was worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CC123Aloha

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Great all around indoor ball. The grip allows me to set the ball fairly descent; additionally I can get a really good standing floater serve in. The only thing that concerns me is that I do have to check the PSI before every use. It does seem to require some air more often than not; but then again this is my first ball I've ever purchased so I don't know if all balls require that or not. Either way, this is my go to ball.
customer_reviews.author: RadMomof5

customer_reviews.title: Not a soft touch at all - very painful to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Thought this would be a good pick along with its counterpart (the V200W) -- after all it's olympic quality, right? No go. This one along with the V200W are exceptionally hard and painful even with casual peppering, competitive play would be abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are all brand new and in perfect condition. However
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 balls. 1 arrived first and the remaining 5 arrived later. They are all brand new and in perfect condition. However, I noticed that the one that arrived first is slightly different from the remaining 5. The feeling and weight are the same, but the color is a tiny bit different and the rubber where the pin goes in is white, whereas with the other 5 is black. Also the printing of the bar code and ball pressure details is different. So I am a little concerned if both versions are original or if one of them isn't. Appreciate your kind feedback. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mo Brow

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: Very soft material. To expensive for that cost. Blows very quickly, even without game.
customer_reviews.author: Taras

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great ball and my granddaughter has used it very much in her practice games and learning proper game moves
customer_reviews.author: Bennie Pepper

customer_reviews.title: ... beat in (don't add extra air) there is nothing better. If kept in cold area it must warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Once this is beat in (don't add extra air) there is nothing better. If kept in cold area it must warm back to room temp and then the best ball ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: I would trade any ball I own for this one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ball I have ever used. I love the feel of it: passing, setting, and especially hitting are all awesome. Even just holding it is exciting. I thought the dynamic of the ball would be similar to the MVA330 or the Molten Flistatec, but this just blew both of them clear out of the water. It moves like crazy. Pin hit, float serve, jump serve, whatever - it doesn't just wobble or meander into the spin - this thing books.
customer_reviews.author: Shandon Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I'm a weeb, but it reintroduced me into volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Review: It's a ball. I like it. Feels smaller than what I remembered, but it is still solid. Background: I'm not a volleyball connoisseur, but used to play for some years. I'm very into the animes. Of course caught the Haikyuu fever, bought this ball, and pushed me to get back into the game.
customer_reviews.author: James D.

customer_reviews.title: I'm not a volleyball player
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a volleyball player, I got this ball because of the anime "Haikyu" but it seems like a cool ball. I don't know how long it will last but it seems good!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: ball deflated
customer_reviews.text: deflated, it feels way harder than other regular balls, bad quality
customer_reviews.author: arcioneo

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Ball Actually
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a highschool volleyball team and I was skeptical to order this ball off of amazon but this ball is actually really great and behaves the same as one ordered from the official sight. I have had it for quite awhile and have no signs of bad build quality. Hope this helps someone else on the fence debating whether or not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Campante

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: This ball requires BB level skill to be played with at minimum due. Heavier ball that will fall quicker than your usual Molten or Soft Touch volleyball and requires more precise ball controls. Grips are it is good. Still breaking it in but overall so far, I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jyo

customer_reviews.title: I felt like it is smaller and lighter than the usual volleyballs ...
customer_reviews.text: I have big hands, and for several months I was practicing volleyball with a BASKETBALL. When I received this ball, I felt like it is smaller and lighter than the usual volleyballs but in the second day when I went to the gym and started playing with it I felt like it is the natural and right ball. So now I am happy with it and feel good playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Keyvan

customer_reviews.title: Good Price more than all the shops in my country
customer_reviews.text: If you love volleyball this is the right product for you
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Centurión

customer_reviews.title: a very good indoor ball
customer_reviews.text: Everyone knows this is the 'official' ball of volleyball. It's a great ball to play with, moves true through the air, and it's very 'spinable'. The color pattern is great for setters as well; it's easy to see which way the ball is spinning, and how fast. BUT this is a 'hard' ball, so while the hitters [like me] love it, the non hitters/back row players/women almost unanimously hate this ball, preferring a much softer one. In fact of all the nights/leagues I play in, only one league will use this one, all the others use a softer ball.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Charley

customer_reviews.title: Ready to spike it!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the ball and the colors. I didn't realize how cheap my other volleyball was until I felt this one.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth dipiazza

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ball
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ball, soft enough yet well balanced and flies true
customer_reviews.author: Jay Osmecki

customer_reviews.title: Slips too much, not the old feel
customer_reviews.text: It slips a lot when wet, the "feel" is not like the old ones... can't use it for games... ;(
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Ibarra

customer_reviews.title: Came as expected
customer_reviews.text: Just as how I expected the ball to be. It is original, light and comfortable to use. My arm tends to hurt if the ball is too hard but the foam makes it more comfortable and easier to use
customer_reviews.author: Rno

customer_reviews.title: i like the colors i would recommend to buy this product ...
customer_reviews.text: i still have this ball . i like the colors i would recommend to buy this product because it is durable
customer_reviews.author: glenculanding

customer_reviews.title: Good ball overall even with small defects.
customer_reviews.text: It's good, love the ball, however there are some defects on the ball. Look like its peeling off, but it's very small. Some cringles in some places, however this dosent effect how this ball performs. It's a good ball :)
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Star of the court
customer_reviews.text: My son reported back from his volleyball session and said all were happy with the feel and weight of this ball!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Freck

customer_reviews.title: It sets very well the indentions on it are awesome. It is a little bit harder than the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a hitters ball for sure. It sets very well the indentions on it are awesome. It is a little bit harder than the average rec ball but once you get use to it there is no other ball like this out there.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent VollyBall
customer_reviews.text: this is a dream volleyball for players, quality is wonderful! Best volleyball! Took me some time to get used to it, because it’s lighter than the volleyball I had before
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Souza

customer_reviews.title: Deliveries a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery Attempted? Attempted my ass. They were SIX STOPS away. 6 stops. Instead, they decided to pass my house.
customer_reviews.author: JunChul Shin

customer_reviews.title: Hitter's ball. Has a good feel, people complain about it at open gym.
customer_reviews.text: Personally really like the visibility of the ball, never gets lost in the light. Nice solid, reassuring thud when you hit with it. People at my open gym (people of all skill levels) generally make me switch for a softer ball, so we hardly get to play with this one. While I enjoy playing with it, this ended up being a very expensive practice ball.
customer_reviews.author: lamj

customer_reviews.title: but he wasn't satisfied. I bought him the Mikasa to replace it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Tachikara for my son, who is an avid vb player, but he wasn't satisfied. I bought him the Mikasa to replace it and he loves it! He says nothing but good about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems like fake.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t Match mikasa standards. Even being a replica it should be really better. I have bought a lot of mva 200 replicas and they sete way better. It’s harder tcham normal and a kind of different material.
customer_reviews.author: Henrique

customer_reviews.title: This is still my favorite indoor volleyball
customer_reviews.text: Been playing volleyball for 6 years. This is still my favorite indoor volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffers

customer_reviews.title: Smaller in size - is this fake?
customer_reviews.text: Ball is good, but the size is smaller. It is not a regular size, I was disappointed, it doesn't look like to be official ball.
customer_reviews.author: Yerem

customer_reviews.title: Great design and sharp look
customer_reviews.text: Great design and sharp look. Easy to bump, set, hit. I've played with volleyballs before that feel like a balloon or playground ball. Not with this Mikasa. Everyone that has played with this ball absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: ... who playing volleyball in their school and club team love this ball so much
customer_reviews.text: My son and daughter who playing volleyball in their school and club team love this ball so much. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Benbow

customer_reviews.title: Pro VB
customer_reviews.text: If ever there was a volleyball that says "For Pros only" this is it. Hard and slippery. I think the ball was designed to be unforgiving considering the level of play it's used for. That being said, I still like to practice with it. (Rec/intermediate player)
customer_reviews.author: Troy in Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this volleyball as a Christmas present & it came way ahead of schedule in time for Christmas. The ball is shipped deflated & was easy to inflate. This is the official ball is used in Southern California Volleyball Association (SCVA) matches & is quite a bit cheaper than buying it @ a sporting goods store.
customer_reviews.author: Lennie

customer_reviews.title: Meeh
customer_reviews.text: Ball is to hard and not enough bounce, i think the outside material is too heavy for indoor volleyball, just my opinion, other than that it will do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Arriaza

customer_reviews.title: This is the best volleyball ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best volleyball ever!!!!!! I don't recommend this ball for beginners, because of its rough/tough texture, but definitely for those who play very often. I definitely recommend this product!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing ball!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. It is the ball used in the Beijing Olympics.. the ball is PRO. It is harder and a tad smaller than typical balls, you really need to man handle this ball, but once you do.. man.. it is great. setters, hitters and float servers will LOVE this ball!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, professional ball
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ball so far I had purchase or used in all my life playing volleyball, softy, precise, so great to serve, attack. Is not heavy at all, and it do not hurt the arms. Nobody of my friends complained about the ball actually the game is more intense now and better and better.
customer_reviews.author: Sintia S.

customer_reviews.title: I sent it to my friends in the Philippines and ...
customer_reviews.text: I sent it to my friends in the Philippines and they are loving it. I just hope they can include an inflating pin with the package.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Gier

customer_reviews.title: she thinks it is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the niece, she thinks it is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Beech

customer_reviews.title: Good ball.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them as game balls and they are so easy to see. Some teams aren't thrilled because they are so different from what they practice with but once play starts, that attitude seems to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great vball - Nice feel to it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this ball last night and pumped it up right away since it wasn't frozen. Once I got the right pressure the ball to me feels great. I don't feel the slickness to it that may have to do with to much air or the fact there are no groves on it like normal vballs have. So far to me it has a nice padding to it - it does feel a little heavy so not sure what thats about. I will not be able to use it for another week so we will see if it loses air sitting. Overall a great purchase....
customer_reviews.author: I. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: very pleased indeed. Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so jacked to get this. very pleased indeed. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and soft touch on this ball, can't wait to use it on our team games.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Banegas

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few days for it to get softer. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Probably cheapest place to buy this ball. The ball comes newly pumped so it takes a few days for it to become soft enough to play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Really good texture on ball. Control is a plus with this ball!! A little harder ball but by far my favorite so far
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay

customer_reviews.title: Put all the details on website not less details
customer_reviews.text: This ball is small in size and this is not official game ball because of its size not happy with size at all
customer_reviews.author: garry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for intermitted and higher plays and it's the one they used in the haikyuu
customer_reviews.author: You

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: High quality ball! Coming from an experienced collegiate volleyball player
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good for competition and for fun.
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent volleyball would highly recommend to anyone wanting starting to play volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I love this ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball seems smaller, though it is not. Great balance and plays well. This is picky, but the only thing that isn't great about it is the fact that the topspin curve is less predictable in agressive play. Otherwise, awesome ball.
customer_reviews.author: William Pochron

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was super excited to get this ball
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was super excited to get this ball! It's one of the best balls on the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: vbmomma

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this aball is amazing to play indoors like a pro, fully recomended
customer_reviews.author: andres duran

customer_reviews.title: quality different from different vender?
customer_reviews.text: I got it the same brand/type but somehow it's not as soft or well-cushioned as the one my friend got from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: Glander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor ball. Used in the olympics. I love the color pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Bowen

customer_reviews.title: best volleyball
customer_reviews.text: i liked everything about it other than the fact that it came with like little scars
customer_reviews.author: Tac Vong

customer_reviews.title: boll
customer_reviews.text: nice boll when i play it go over net i win haha also easy float make me happy
customer_reviews.author: Kostya Ryzhkov

customer_reviews.title: Awsome Volley Ball
customer_reviews.text: This volley ball is really good it used indoors alot in my country
customer_reviews.author: Younes Balah

customer_reviews.title: best volleyball ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my brother and his friedns who play twice a week. He loves it and says it's the best volleyball he has ever played with. He also has the Molten Pro Touch and prefers this one over it.
customer_reviews.author: e777

customer_reviews.title: Great Official FIVB Ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is just great. The trajectory when you hit it is stable, doesn't shank and the leather is different in a good way. It's not the official FIVB volleyball for nothing. I love the color swirl marks, very visible.
customer_reviews.author: Tades J.

customer_reviews.title: Original Mikasa MVA200
customer_reviews.text: That is original Mikasa MVA200 Perfect ball for indoor games for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir Econom

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING for hitters
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING for hitters, this ball is money for those who hit real hard. Some setters do complain that it's slippery though
customer_reviews.author: simple user

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BALL!
customer_reviews.text: First off I would like to say that this volleyball is amazing!!! I love the quality of the ball. although the ball takes some getting used to because of the slick surface; the tiny little holes/ grooves in the ball make up for all of that. I love the design and control of the ball, when ever I go to set the ball it always has a perfect feel/ touch to it. although most people call it a hitters ball I would now like to call it a setters ball!
customer_reviews.author: James Ronson

customer_reviews.title: This mikasa volleyball is the best volleyball. Very nice grip
customer_reviews.text: This mikasa volleyball is the best volleyball. Very nice grip, the design is a plus, I absolutely recommend this volleyball for those who want to play and feel a better competitive level.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel A Laguna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 10/10 ball!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning and perfect! This is the only ball that you will ever need. Only downside i suppose is, if you do not dry it frequently in a set, the ball slips off easily. But so far, I have not heard any complains from my team on this ball. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: it has lines attached to the patterns on each side but its supposed to be there and is nothing to worry about the ball is great and feels great when spiking or setting and has amazing control
customer_reviews.author: Catherine kim

customer_reviews.title: Good ball
customer_reviews.text: It is a good ball and barely runs out of air/pressure.
customer_reviews.author: volleyball captain

customer_reviews.title: I thought the ball was suppose to be bigger.
customer_reviews.text: For an Olympic size ball I was a little disappointed that the ball was smaller than anticipated. I would not order this particular one again.
customer_reviews.author: LuLu

customer_reviews.title: First assessment is that it is generally good. The pin hole is a bit tight to ...
customer_reviews.text: First assessment is that it is generally good. The pin hole is a bit tight to inflate with standard needle valve.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene G Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Will heighten your play
customer_reviews.text: Very good ball and must have for higher level play
customer_reviews.author: David Bowker

customer_reviews.title: Great ball, great price
customer_reviews.text: The volleyball is great. My son asked for one for his 17th birthday. I found it on another site, but it was more expensive. We received it in like 2 days, it was incredible. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cypert

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: My friends like it very very much. Well, it's soft. really soft. We are used playing hard one. Totally it's a good ball
customer_reviews.author: Zhenchao Ge

customer_reviews.title: ... and so far he reported that the ball was good. The price was fair too
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my littler brother and so far he reported that the ball was good. The price was fair too!
customer_reviews.author: kvanger

customer_reviews.title: Grip is not as good
customer_reviews.text: The grip and traction is not as good as I thought
customer_reviews.author: Junny Yeung

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be smaller...
customer_reviews.text: Our group tried to use it in the indoor play but found it to be smaller than the SV-5 Gold we normally used. It is also harder to control as well. We ended up reverting back to the SV-5 Gold...
customer_reviews.author: W. Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Great indoor V-ball, no complaints. Used it on indoor and outdoor courts. It works wonderfully. I would suggest this to anyone as a solid v-ball
customer_reviews.author: etapi65

customer_reviews.title: Good but Flistatec is better
customer_reviews.text: Very good ball, but Flistatec is much better. The cover is too slick & doesn't have a very responsive bounce. Other players feel the ball is too hard (properly inflated to 4.5 lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Its been several years since I started to play volleyball and this ball has been on my "to get" list for quite a while.....Mikasa is def a synonym of quality and satisfaction....product arrived impeccable...and on the estimated date. Iim very glad with my purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Dacruz

customer_reviews.title: Nice volleyball, but I"m not sure it will ever ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice volleyball, but I"m not sure it will ever get broken in. It still feels as hard as the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad B

customer_reviews.title: Great for veteran and skilled players
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ball, but rookies don't like it because they can't bump it properly.
customer_reviews.author: J Vanger

customer_reviews.title: A little hard on the radii
customer_reviews.text: If you're playing co-ed, girls will complain about this ball after about 5 passes. It's a little hard. Honestly, I'm a big guy, but after peppering with this ball for a few minutes, my radii were starting to get a little numb too. So it hurts to pass, but is very satisfying to set and hit. You definitely do NOT want to be on the receiving end of a hard hit, no matter how or where you take it. Long story short, this ball feels pretty sweet, but your friends won't want to play with it. Ultimately, not worth the hefty pricetag.
customer_reviews.author: GB

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Best volleyball ever, and it's really resistent. That's the ball all the major leagues in the world use. I'd definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Denys Rocco

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, is the real deal
customer_reviews.text: I love this ball. Great spin, drops nicely! Great texture. Some people we play with say its too hard, but I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great ball, I use it every week for volleyball. Well-balanced and has great action.
customer_reviews.author: Mroz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the ball. Slightly hard to start with but you won't enjoy any other ball like this.
customer_reviews.author: Aekendra

product_meta.title: Mikasa MVA200 2008(Beijing), 2012(London), and 2016(Rio) indoor Olympic Games Ball (Blue/Yellow)
product_meta.description: The Mikasa MVA200 Indoor Volleyball is tested and ready for high-quality performance in the Olympic Arena and was used in the 2008 Olympic Games in Beijing, China. Features include an eight-panel swirl design that allows for more contact area on the surface to improve passing and control and a unique dimpled microfiber material that creates turbulence and cuts down on resistance as the ball flies through the air. This lack of resistance allows the ball to fly through the air in a truer form so you can be creative with your serves and spikes.
feature_bullets: official game ball for the 2008(Beijing), 2012(London), and 2016(Rio) indoor Olympic Games
New 8 panel swirl design allows for more contact area on the surface of the ball, improving passing and control.
Dimpled microfiber material creates turbulence in the air, which allows ball to fly through air.
Cemented panel seams allows air between panel and carcass for a softer feel.
Blue and yellow color pattern is picked up fastest by human eye allowing for better player reaction time.
For optimal performance, additional inflation may be required. Ball pump not included.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
